Text saved: The **Hunger Games**, which is a special competition, happens every year. The **Capitol**, which is the main city, uses these games to make the districts remember that they are punished because they rebelled. Every year, one boy and one girl, who are between 12 and 18 years old, are chosen from each district by chance. These chosen teenagers are called "tributes", and they must fight in a competition where only one person can stay alive. All the people in the country are forced to watch this event on television.
